function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncontrolled data collection and storage leading to privacy and security risks.","Impact":"Potential for unauthorized access, data breaches, and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy regulations, encryption methods, and access control measures.","Technologies":"Data encryption, blockchain technology, access control systems.","People":"City residents, urban planners, policymakers.","Owner":"Government, technology corporations, urban planning entities."},{"Description":"High volume of data increasing the risk of data overload and mismanagement.","Impact":"Potential for data misinterpretation, storage inefficiencies, and decision-making errors.","Mitigation":"Adopt advanced data management and analysis tools, implement data governance policies, and provide training on data handling best practices.","Technologies":"Big data analytics, data management platforms, artificial intelligence for data analysis.","People":"Data analysts, urban planners, policymakers.","Owner":"Technology corporations, government agencies, academic institutions."}]}
